Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won by 5 wickets (with 10 balls remaining)
Sadeera Samarawickrama made an unbeaten 91 off 107 balls
Sybrand Engelbrecht scored 70 off 82 balls for Netherlands
Sri Lanka chased down 263/5 in 48.2 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Kusal Mendis, Sri Lanka's captain, expressed happiness with the team's performance, praising the bowlers and Sadeera Samarawickrama's batting
Scott Edwards, Netherlands' coach, mentioned that they didn't start well but praised Aryan Dutt's bowling
Sadeera Samarawickrama said he did his basics right and knew it would be challenging in the latter stages due to the pitch conditions
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka needed only 82 runs in more than 17 overs to win
Netherlands managed to drag Sri Lanka almost all the way despite their efforts
The final four runs were scored in the last over as Madi Hemantha hit a four off Logan van Beek to secure the win
